description: A delicious plant based, Asian inspired dish with a tangy finish.
keywords: Dumpling,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Vegan,Dairy free
name: Dumplings with Plant Based 'Meat' Filling Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grate the cabbage and squeee as much liquid from it as possible and set to one side.
Combine vegetables, herbs and soy saouce with the cabbage and mix well.
Break the rice paper in halfa nd soak in luke warm water for 2 minutes.

Place a teaspoon of filling onto each piece of rice paper. Carefully lift the walls of the rice paper up around the filling and twist to close. Allow the dumplings to set for 10 minutes. Cut off any excess rice paper.
Heat up a skillet to a medium heat, add the sesame oil and fry the dumplings for approx 4 minutes turning frequently until browned all over.
Remove from the heat and serve with a choice of dipping sauce and some sliced chillies and scallions to garnish.
